application.doc: Add a node to the cluster

method.name: POST
method.doc: This web service will register a new node into the cluster. It should be executed on the new node.

param.name: Content-Type:multipart/form-data
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service provided.

param.name: restricted
param.doc: Should this node join the cluster a restricted node. A value of "on" or "true" will indicate yes it should join as a restricted node. All other values will assume it will not be a restricted node. Not providing a value assumes not a restricted node.

param.name: address
param.doc: The cluster identifier this node should present to the primary master. This is the IP address or hostname that other members of the cluster will use to communicate with this node. If this parameter is not specified, the default cluster identifier will be used.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
